title: Club wants to see Addendum C as a form with all details
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that club is viewing the multi-C widget
AND that there exists a created ADD C (preliminary or above)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the status of that Add C
custom_expected:
THEN the Add C is opened as a single form
AND all fields under the "Additional Details" section are populated with the same information available via the Multi-C widget

title: Club wants to always see the player info on top of my screen when on Addendum C forms
custom_preconds: GIVEN that club is viewing a single Add C
custom_expected:
THEN a header is always present with the player name
AND player club
AND level of play
AND roster status

title: Club wants to view Addendum Cs from Player History
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing a player's profile
custom_steps: WHEN view looks at the bottom of the profile page
custom_expected:
THEN there is a player history widget
AND that widget shows all the player's Add Cs in chronological order
AND the text read "Signed an Addendum C for year: 2015 status: Approved" where year and status update according to that Addendum C
AND the description text links to the actual single C

title: Club wants access to Single C and Player profile forms from e-sig widget and add C widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that player is viewing the e-sig widgets
-or-
GIVEN that player is viewing the Add C widget
custom_steps:
1. WHEN user clicks the form type (i.e. Addendum C)
2. WHEN user clicks a name from the Player column
custom_expected:
1. THEN a the single C is opened
2. THEN the player's profile is opened

title: Club is able to see the dates that the Add C changed states and by whom
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing an Add C
custom_steps:
1. WHEN the user tenders the Add C

2. WHEN the user submits the Add C

3. WHEN the user logs in as BOC and approves the Add C

4. WHEN the Add C is auto-approved
custom_expected:
THEN a preliminary Add C's status field will be colored red,

1. THEN a time stamp and the user are recorded in the appropriate field AND current status is Tendered and colored green 

2. THEN a time stamp and the user are recorded in the appropriate field
AND the current status is Pending Approval and colored green

3. THEN a time stamp and the user are recorded in the appropriate field
AND the current status is Approved

4. THEN the same time stamp and 'Auto-Approved' are recorded in both the Submitted and Approved fields
AND the current status is Approved

title: Club is able to see other club's approved Addendum Cs
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user views the contract history of a player that belongs to another club
custom_expected:
THEN they can see all approved transactions
AND Add Cs in other states are hidden
AND clicking the Addendum C should open the Approved C (including attachments) in view mode with only the close button

title: Club is able to view the e-sig status on form
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a form has been submitted for e-signature
custom_steps:
1. WHEN the PDF is generating
    AND the user clicks e-sign again

2. WHEN the PDF has already been generated and the form is in e-sig state
    AND the user clicks e-sign again
custom_expected:
1. THEN show the generating PDF modal

2. THEN show the e-sig status screen

title: Club wants to edit Single Addendum C as a form including save/cancel
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing a single Add C
custom_steps: WHEN the form is in preliminary or tendered states
custom_expected:
THEN the edit button is available
AND it puts the form in edit mode
AND user can make changes to editable fields, save and cancel

title: Club is able to select Addendum C year on a single C form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is viewing a single Addendum C
AND the form is in edit mode
custom_steps:
1. WHEN the date is before the system date "Addendum Cs can be created for next year"

2. WHEN the date is on or after the system date "Addendum Cs can be created for next year"
    AND before the system date "Addendum C year defaults to next year"

3. WHEN the date is on or after the system date " Addendum C year defaults to next year"
custom_expected:
1. THEN the user can only see the current year and this field is not editable

2. THEN the user can select the current or following years in a dropdown

3. THEN the Addendum C year defaults to next year and is editable

title: Club wants to add additional text to Addendum C
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing a single Add C
custom_expected:
THEN there is an extra field called "Additional text"
AND the field is limited to 250 characters and must automatically wrap lines. If there is overflow text, it has a scroll bar
AND there is a counter that lets you know how many characters have been entered
AND users can save this field with the form
AND this field should be editable in the same scenarios that the salaries are

title: Club is able to print froma  Single C form with additional text
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is viewing a single Addendum C
AND the form is in view or edit mode
AND the form is not in Preliminary state
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Print button
custom_expected:
THEN the form prints out including the additional text 
AND the additional text should not take up more than 2 lines for 250 characters
AND the Add C form should be adjusted so it all fits on one page

title: Club wants to see levels of play that are in my ORG in a Single C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing a single C
custom_expected:
THEN the minor league salary table only lists the clubs that were affiliated with the Org at the time of Add C creation
AND if multiple clubs belong to the same level of play they should use only one row with the club names separated by commas
AND clubs should be ordered by level of play

title: Club is able to use "Enter Salary" feature on Single C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is viewing a single Add C
AND the salaries are editable
custom_steps:
1. WHEN the salaries are editable

2. WHEN the salaries are not editable
custom_expected:
1. THEN the Enter Salary button works the same way as Multi-C widget and has the default salary structures, club salary structures, duplicate previous, and single salary value

2. THEN hide this button

title: Club is able to see the player's salaries from his previous Add C
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing a single Add C
custom_expected:
THEN there is a column 'Previous Salary' in the Minor League Salaries table
AND the column is populated with the salaries from the last previous approved Add C or contract

title: Club wants to easily populate single c with paragraph 2 salary
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a player has a Paragraph 2 Salary (https://www.pivotaltracker.com/n/projects/1402858/stories/106044746)
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Enter Salary dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN there is a Paragraph 2 salary option
AND this option is the first available on the list
AND the system only populates levels of play that have a P2 salary

title: Club is able to close out of a single Add C.
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing a single Add C
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks close
custom_expected: THEN the user is returned to the same dashboard/tab or form from where they navigated to the Add C

title: Club is able to delete a single Addendum C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is viewing a single Add C
AND that Add C is in a Preliminary state
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks delete
AND confirms
custom_expected:
THEN a global delete message is triggered
AND the Add C is deleted from records

title: Club is able to attach and label Addendum Cs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is viewing a single Add C
AND the form is in edit mode
AND the form is in tendered state
custom_steps: WHEN the club clicks Browse or drags a form into the Attached files section
custom_expected:
THEN the club can add the label Addendum C
AND the helper (telling user they can only attach in Tendered state) is visible

title: Club is able to view any files already attached to club's Single Addendum C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has attached a file to an Add C using the multi-C widget
AND the user is viewing that single Add C
custom_steps:
1. WHEN the user is viewing the bottom of the form

2. WHEN the user is viewing the top of the form
custom_expected:
2. THEN there is a section called "Attached Files" that is collapsible
AND there is helper text  "Note: You cannot attach files to an Addendum C until it has been tendered."
AND the file attached in the preconditions is shown here with global Attached files feature set (name, label, date/time modified and size) and a comments column
AND this file is labelled "Add C"

3. THEN everything else is in a section called "Information" that is collapsible

title: Club is able to attach miscellaneous files to their addendum C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is viewing a single Add C
AND the form is in edit mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user attaches a file

1. AND selects the Add C label

2. AND selects the miscellaneous label
custom_expected:
1. THEN any subsequent attachments cannot use that label

2. THEN the miscellaneous label can be used as many times as the user wants
AND when running checks (https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/104738108), (https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/104731646) that check for file attachments, these files are ignored

AND user can save attachments to the form

title: BOC wants e-signed Addendum C's with no flag to get auto-approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a club has created and submitted an Add C
AND that Add C has no flags
AND today's date is within the Add C Auto-Approval system date range
custom_steps: WHEN the user submits the Add C (either manually or through E-Sig)
custom_expected: THEN the Add C status is automatically changed to Approved

title: BOC adds a stamp to an uploaded Add C PDF with BOC signature when approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that there is an Add C submitted for approval by a club
AND that Add C has an uploaded PDF
custom_steps: WHEN that Add C is approved by the BOC
custom_expected:
THEN place a BOC stamp on the attached uploaded PDF including the wording such as "For Commissioners office use only", "Approved and recorded" , "By commissioner of Baseball" and the signature "Roy Krasik "designee"
AND record the date of approval in the date field
AND the PDF can be opened and printed with the signature from the paperclip icon on the multi-C widget.

title: Club wants access to Single C and Player profile forms from e-sig and Add C widgets
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that player is viewing the e-sig widgets
-or-
GIVEN that player is viewing the Add C widget
custom_steps:
1. WHEN user clicks the form type (i.e. Addendum C)
2. WHEN user clicks a name from the Player column
custom_expected:
1. THEN a the single C is opened
2. THEN the player's profile is opened

title: Addendum C's that are created with contracts appear on Multi - C widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a player has an active MN contract for the current year
custom_steps: WHEN user views the multi-c widget
custom_expected: THEN Add Cs created during contract creation are viewable

title: User see's history of minor league contracts in contract history
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user views a players contract history
custom_expected:
THEN they can see the player's historical minor league contract information
AND Year, Contract Level, Signing Org/Club, Signing Date, Salary, Status, Signing Bonus, Add F, G and Terms must be populated
AND Salary field in ebis 2.5 should populate with salary that was entered for the signing club's level of play
AND the terms column should list the names of all Addendum B clauses included. It can be ellipsed and hovering over it should show the full text

title: Club is able to see and open Addendum C's in Contract History
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user views player's contract history widget
custom_expected:
THEN display all of the player's past and current addendum C's in Contract history
AND the Year, Contract Level, Signing Org/Club, Signing Date, Salary and Status fields should be populated
AND signing Org/Club is the Org/Club at the player's level of play on the Addendum C signing date
AND signing date is only populated if it was populated in the form
AND the Salary should be the number that was entered for the player's level of play on date of signing.
AND the Year and Contract level column should link to the Add C single form (for this story - ebis 2 created forms only)

title: Club is able to see other club's approved Addendum C's in contract history
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user views the contract history of a player that belongs to another club
custom_expected:
THEN they can see all approved transactions
AND Add Cs in other states are hidden
AND clicking the Addendum C should open the Approved C (including attachments) in view mode with only the close button

title: Club is stopped from creating an Addendum C if player is not in the same org
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as club
AND user is viewing a player's contract history widget
AND that player is not part of the user's org
custom_steps: WHEN user tries to create a new Addendum C
custom_expected: THEN user sees hard error: "An Addendum C cannot be created for a player that belongs to another Organization."

title: Club can create a new Addendum C from Contract History
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing the Contract History page
custom_expected:
THEN the Create New button has an Addendum C option that appears after Minor League Contract option
AND selecting it will take user to a preliminary single Addendum C for that player
AND it is in edit mode
AND it should not be saved until user hits Save at least once

title: Club is stopped if creating an Addendum C for a player without an active Minor Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing the contract history of a player
AND that player does not have an active minor contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to create an Add C for the player
custom_expected: THEN show hard error: "The Player does not have an active minor league contract."

title: Club is able to create a subsequent add c for same year
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user is viewing a player's contract history
custom_steps: WHEN user creates a new Add C
custom_expected:
THEN the user can create one for a year even if another already exists for that year
AND the subsequent Add C will not show up in the multi-c widget
AND the label should just be 'Addendum C'

title: Club is able to print from a single C form with additional text
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is viewing a single Addendum C
AND the form is in view or edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Print button
custom_expected:
THEN the form prints out including the additional text
AND the additional text should not take up more than 2 lines for 250 characters
AND the Add C form should be adjusted so it all fits on one page

title: Club is able to tender or submit a single addendum C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as Club
AND User selects a single preliminary addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN User fufills all required fields and clicks tender
AND Clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN Form changes to Tender
AND Turns into Pending
AND All changes are saved when states are changed
AND All rule checks are ran

title: Player is able to e-sign from the e-sig status screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as club
AND Has a Addendum C in Tendered State
custom_steps:
WHEN User click's e-sign
AND Submits for E-signature
AND Clicks E-sign again
AND Clicks on pencil next to players name
AND User completes adobe e-sign
AND Re-checks E-sig status screen
custom_expected:
THEN E-Sig Status Screen has green check mark to indicate e-signature has been completed for player

*If user does not complete player e-sign when already clicked then the name de-bolds itself.

title: Club is able to e-sign from a single c form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as club
AND Goes to a tendered addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN Users scrolls to bottom of addendum C page
AND Clicks on E-sign button
AND Clicking Submit for e-signature
custom_expected:
THEN E-sign button should appear on bottom 
AND "Are you sure message" appears when e-sign is clicked
AND Generating PDF Screen should appear
AND Form appears on player and club e-sig widgets
